page.title: 08Worth House Hotel
page.content: The Worth House Hotel, which includes the Stable Door Restaurant, is situated in Worth 4 kilometres from Wells on the B3l39 road. Owned by the Mason family it is typical of the establishments which have lost their previous farming functions and which now offer food and accommodation for the benefit of tourists in this part of Somerset. It is surrounded by open country and has extensive views of the Mendip Hills. The house itself retains the charm of a dwelling which, in part, is 4OO years old, complete with beamed ceilings and exposed stone walls. It has first-class centrally-heated accommodation, three lounges, colour TV, a large lawned garden and ample parking. The owners take pride in offering fresh home cooking to their guests.
